page.title: 17CHILDRENS GAMES
page.content: We made a survey of the games which the junior children play at shool.Most of the boys like to play football al- though we have to use a tennis-ball because the playground is not very big.Many girls play various skipping games like 'Vote,Vote','Jump Mississi- pi' and 'I Like Coffee'. All of us play 'It' in various ways.'British Bulldog', 'Budge' 'Stuck in the Mud', 'Victory', and 'Off-ground It' are the favourites. The girls also play 'The Big Ship', 'In and out the Dusty Bluebells' and 'Doctor,Doctor'. Of course we all play Marbles and Conkers at the proper timesof the year.
